alert.note: Alert for Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 5:48AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL MARION COUNTY THROUGH 615 AM EDT... At 548 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers capable of producing a landspout 12 miles northwest of Black Diamond, or 12 miles southwest of Rainbow Lakes Estates, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rainbow Lakes Estates, Dunnellon, and Romeo. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
